channel.title: Doujutsu AP items/jutsu/allies
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Doujutsu AP items/jutsu/allies"

item.title: Re: Doujutsu AP items/jutsu/allies
item.content:encoded:
NinjaOn works as well, and if you have Glowslinging unlocked, you can get up to +33% Dou AP from that.

But the best thing to do is make yourself a team of Karen, Robo 3 and Stalker 3 and do the highest-cranked BurgerNinja missions you can run reliably.

item.title: Re: Doujutsu AP items/jutsu/allies
item.content:encoded: â„–1 in ur list should be Ramen that gives +200% dou AP. U can use 2 and more of them if u have cirtain item and Sue lvl2 luck :) (and lots of JXP to spend, of course)

item.title: Doujutsu AP items/jutsu/allies
item.content:encoded:
I wanted to level my Doujutsu, which is rather low.
But I was wondering if there were any items or jutsu's or allies that could make the leveling go faster. I already checked the Allies page and found none, but perhaps I missed something.

Anything you know is appreciated.
